elements.2211.03137_920fea3764f6eba947e0ffc30f8d6: The Super Tau Charm Facility (STCF) is a proposed electron-positron collider working at
elements.2211.03137_00070546c05640aa339af0ec9d605: GeV, and the peak luminosity is designed to be above
elements.2211.03137_4bd111be84f72d62c264531db34bb: The massive amount of scientific data brings great challenges to the offline data processing software, including the Monte Carlo
elements.2211.03137_be247328f94602cbcfc311763ff13: (MC) simulation, calibration, reconstruction as well as the data analysis
elements.2211.03137_eab3110cec7540383b3ef13090d7a: To facilitate efficient offline data processing, the offline software of Super Tau Charm Facility (OSCAR) is developed based on SNiPER, a lightweight framework designed for HEP experiments, as well as a few state-of-art software in the HEP community, such as podio and DD4hep.
elements.2211.03137_22403cb71d17d237f9ba9418cd3b3: This paper describes the design and implementation of OSCAR, which provides the foundation for the development of complex algorithms to be applied on the large data sets produced by STCF, particularly the way to integrate the common HEP software toolkits, such as Geant4, DD4hep and podio, into SNiPER
elements.2211.03137_fd3a86cbc7ee2740f65648c6762dd: The software framework also provides a potential solution for other lightweight HEP experiments as well.
elements.2211.03137_235287e7112ae47ef05665da54f60: ffline software framework; STCF; OSCAR; SNiPER
elements.2211.03137_045e996b9426aca2bce3e04e5008e: is a high-luminosity electron-positron collider operating under a center-of-mass energy
elements.2211.03137_627276d0e8e2bb70dbce256df8427: STCF has a rich physics program for the tau and charm physics, providing the precise test of the Standard Model as well as the probe for new physics beyond the Standard Model
elements.2211.03137_cfeda6921403ee98262cad991da23: The STCF project is currently under exploration with an extensive R
elements.2211.03137_801b4fba0e78da53cd1bbb391dc52: D program and would play a crucial role in the high-intensity frontier of elementary particle physics worldwide
elements.2211.03137_06dee6dfb589d127859805f52341f: The peak luminosity of STCF is designed to
elements.2211.03137_3e9763b966566280d9665788fa528: , almost two orders of magnitude higher than the present Tau-Charm factory
elements.2211.03137_c866f2b0529970b5b6c1bf87cf019: The huge amount of scientific data produced by STCF brings a great challenge for STCF offline data processing
elements.2211.03137_fa053ad6603a08cd0467a3f7cc5fb: To provide a powerful and efficient software for the offline data processing tasks, OSCAR is designed and developed to provide a common platform for STCF offline applications, including the MC simulation, the raw data calibration, the reconstruction as well as the data analysis
elements.2211.03137_27d3de8093a2b153636597cb779ec: OSCAR is developed based on SNiPER
elements.2211.03137_e08d94edd08b8bdaf304f31cc25de: , a common lightweight software framework developed for HEP experiments, as well as a few commonly used third party software, such as ROOT
elements.2211.03137_14277e55f0a3231798016a78fd590: Some state-of-art software and toolkits in the HEP community are also incorporated in OSCAR, such as podio
elements.2211.03137_96d2e9ea7417584273d4f0441f58b: This paper aims to present the design and implementation of OSCAR, which also provides a potential solution for other lightweight HEP software as well
elements.2211.03137_18cffc30a7255b8e2d72541e888e5: In Section 2, the basic requirements and design criteria of STCF offline software is outlined
elements.2211.03137_747cd57b2ddcb5c33fbe312a61263: Then Section 3 describes the implementation of OSCAR in detail, including the SNiPER framework, the event data model (EDM), the management of the event data as well as the detector data
elements.2211.03137_bd15b18cc4819213d0b924e67c29b: Section 4 presents some results of application based on OSCAR
elements.2211.03137_a8b013305e8d1f03441884efc591a: Finally, Section 5 summarizes the current status and gives outlook on the development.
elements.2211.03137_9f4b8ecf5763966be480c01b140f5: To effectively build the STCF offline software, the underlying framework plays an essential role
elements.2211.03137_87c01383615818101dafd33a29228: It builds the skeleton of the offline software where application developers or physicists could plug in their code to perform data processing physics analysis
elements.2211.03137_d54dadbeae412aa168a3e4b27d463: However, there exists several challenges for OSCAR
elements.2211.03137_32bdc9c222403bece832f9bb87546: For instance, it is expected that the STCF could run more than one decade, raising requirements of OSCAR's flexibility, stability and compatibility
elements.2211.03137_b8a17453b2b4a5da7504c068e012f: In addition, the huge data volume and low signal to noise ratio of STCF imposes additional requirements on highly efficient event selection (skimming) machanism, which is closely related with the design of OSCAR's data management system and Input/Output
elements.2211.03137_72b67702d69eed4dfc879d453c637: Many state-of-art software for HEP, such as podio and DD4hep, are emerging to provide higher performance on management of event data or detector data for future collider experiments
elements.2211.03137_38b03b641f9b363260edf7a0438c4: Furthermore, some advanced technologies, including many-core architecture and parallel computing, are becoming more and more powerful and successful in HEP data processing
elements.2211.03137_fbd17b1377ffb93219b9b65953c31: In conclusion, OSCAR should not only take full advantage of these technologies above, but keep flexible for upcoming new software in the future as well.
elements.2211.03137_1731f68fc5bbe874328f1a3acfc10: To fulfill the requirements above, one of key design criteria of OSCAR is modularity
elements.2211.03137_ab554bd1deddbcd003a835d60ddfc: Each component takes care of specific functionality and provides well defined interfaces by which they interact with each other
elements.2211.03137_8080f7473244664f36a0fe45b2ea4: Another key design criterion is low coupling, which makes key components independent with each other as possible and shields the implementation of certain functionality from technologies adopted by OSCAR.
elements.2211.03137_c5fac6366535705c68be2a7cba79e: A schematic view of OSCAR is shown in Figure
elements.2211.03137_ad614e119e7f60c95af9494d88939: : It mainly consists of three layers, external libraries, the core software and STCF experiment specific applications
elements.2211.03137_82ac69e76f6f164776d1fdb4e1104: External libraries contain software and toolkits frequently used in HEP experiments, like ROOT, Geant4, etc
elements.2211.03137_7d5dac4612ea02fb761d5e6bf4856: DD4hep and podio, as parts of the Common Turnkey Software Stack (also called as Key4hep)
elements.2211.03137_df13303afc56224ba77acc2adb9d4: , are also adopted for the detector description and the EDM, respectively
elements.2211.03137_d6105b571af03f2ed58f212489ed2: The core software, including the underlying framework, EDM, event data management system, detector data management system as well as interfaces between different components, plays crucial roles for performance and functionality of OSCAR
elements.2211.03137_51caac33117c7a8fee63d75cf6767: Experiment specific applications include software of physics generators, detector simulation, digitization, calibration, reconstruction as well as physics analysis, which are the most important components of OSCAR and are developed based on the core software and external libraries.
elements.2211.03137_e776fe459faaed993a43cae7c4f6b: As the underlying framework of OSCAR, SNiPER is a lightweight software developed for HEP experiments and has been successfully used in a few experiments, such as JUNO
elements.2211.03137_1132fd4c07be0b8a40a0c3a4bacea: The distinguishing features of SNiPER includes the following:
elements.2211.03137_9bc78246eafc256d033c144a07e1b: Support of flexible event processing sequences
elements.2211.03137_79cfa18bb5f241ff9bb325fccf966: (a) , the unit of SNiPER is a
elements.2211.03137_6bc3acd718b8894b51425eca5967d: , which manages the lifetime of events in its
elements.2211.03137_b0362d9752109bc0224788664dc5a: controls its own event loop independently
elements.2211.03137_34495bf32e12a6c6e6311bbc1af81: instances can be configured in a single SNiPER job in a nested structure, as shown in Figure
elements.2211.03137_aa7a806a65eaa22d39739284762aa: instances can be configured flexibly to facilitate complex event processing sequence
elements.2211.03137_64dbe627275060b7736ae0de32c49: could be triggered by another with the
elements.2211.03137_f7d2ab55b9bd207179f075ec43ed1: For example, in an event mixing procedure, the signal and background samples are produced independently
elements.2211.03137_18dd35890365b9e68d3a65b030034: Then each sample can be configured as an input in each
elements.2211.03137_706eb2cc810fdcd516f48fea90707: In this way, the event mixing algorithm in
elements.2211.03137_0cf6fd32b5ed6a3ef02f6bb7f5a01: triggers signal and background inputs on demand according to signal-to-noise ratio.
elements.2211.03137_29492ac2de87c4847faf256fdf8e3: Support of custom data I/O and event buffering
elements.2211.03137_dde9a0a8476bb251035bedbcbfb86: Within SNiPER, data I/O and event buffering can be flexibly implemented based on experiment specific requirements
elements.2211.03137_dfd07f294abeeaad929e700db95f9: For instance, a first input first output (FIFO) data buffer
elements.2211.03137_bf47c5efa9619b2c8b6e8df433a96: is developed, which enables high efficiency data access and storage, as well as the capability to retrieve the events within a defined time window
elements.2211.03137_be6fb6243269c75ec7853ee70abe0: FIFO data buffer stores adjacent events and provides a sophisticated method of memory updating
elements.2211.03137_b80da700d4d21a2d84c8bfdad0970: When turning of the time window, FIFO serves as a buffer which holds single or multiple independent event data objects.
elements.2211.03137_cf68f5689d70cc4cc6d27ddb0e478: s and FIFO , SNiPER has intrinsic superiorities in parallel computing
elements.2211.03137_ebc03ba6b630b692794434c18b72a: To simplify the development of paralleled applications, MT-SNiPER is developed as a non-invasive wrapper of SNiPER kernel modules, so that it is almost transparent for developers to parallelize their applications
elements.2211.03137_bf57d039baaa1cee0d4102bde5c05: The implementation details of MT-SNiPER will be further discussed in Section 5.
elements.2211.03137_e9ce54eacb0cd9b0d619f72e4e6db: In the offline software, algorithms would not directly use event data objects in the persistency store (persistent data), but instead, use event data objects in memory (transient data)
elements.2211.03137_37018fc69946dcc1ec1f57c38cd75: For both persistent and transient data, there is one set of description for EDM objects
elements.2211.03137_c7e3f8bf6e8274ebf46d574a380a7: EDM, the heart part of offline software, does not only define the event information and correlations between event objects in different processing stages, but provides the interface and communication channels between different application algorithms as well
elements.2211.03137_04608c86faee8c883d676594c11ce: Therefore, it is crucial to design an efficient EDM that meets all use cases in offline data processing as well as physics analysis.
elements.2211.03137_186896cd15c9537eaac63c4f80546: Based on podio, EDM4hep project aims to design common EDM for future collider experiments
elements.2211.03137_f576600e867cbe04a2d15b9132f6b: In this project, the event information and relationships between different objects are described in yaml
elements.2211.03137_a393d60eef79d3ee9e6e47321c909: files, based on which C++ code for EDM classes could be automatically generated
elements.2211.03137_b60f7256a3114a3c7a7acf497ad7a: In addition, using plain-old-data (pod) types will have fine support on parallelism
elements.2211.03137_285285bcc6e4f03b06fa9d8da1aae: Therefore, the EDM of STCF, which has been implemented as an extension of EDM4hep, naturally supports parallel computing for STCF offline data processing
elements.2211.03137_87a93d73d86815585ee49fb59a19a: include EDM at the simulation stage and reconstruction stage, as well as the relationships between them.
elements.2211.03137_3211c02caf6fd99935f445e062a83: Integrating podio into SNiPER is vital in order to make use of the EDM based on podio efficiently within OSCAR
elements.2211.03137_a1c4aa5b3fb2aebd0f702cb1f1ccc: The event data management of podio mainly consists of three parts.
elements.2211.03137_3faa123d3ed13364321b5cf2dff5d: handles event data in memory, while
elements.2211.03137_74b80fbe824dceccce44011822491: manage data input and output, respectively
elements.2211.03137_28a723b287394bcf6e351f66ddaf3: Correspondingly, the event data management of OSCAR consists of three components:
elements.2211.03137_5ff7ce82593c35125213cf18e2bc2: , which would be triggered automatically at the beginning and ending of an event loop respectively.
elements.2211.03137_9d8b1ce27bfd06e6fa803e6e3fb61: to convert persistent event data from file into transient event data in

elements.2211.03137_43cd564364a013b080fac895d2256: is developed as an user end template class to provide interfaces of identifying and accessing event data objects from

elements.2211.03137_a8e5953e859cc41dc504f3316eba3: The detector simulation framework, a middleware between Geant4 and SNiPER, has been implemented
elements.2211.03137_9ee0029aff7f85a6f4fcd3ea76f9c: It consists of the integration of Geant4 and SNiPER, configurable user interfaces, geometry management and modularized user actions
elements.2211.03137_b608a9928323cfaa695ad64e66534: Based on DD4hep, a geometry management system (GMS)
elements.2211.03137_d869efcee7bd90c02dd647e263279: is designed to provide a consistent detector description for simulation, reconstruction and visualization
elements.2211.03137_7e2f104ee946d3fccc3812eb5f173: In GMS, the library of elements and materials is shared and each sub-detector is described in a separated XML file, while the full detector is defined and configured in a mother XML file
elements.2211.03137_d669ffe8ba60eb7eaa379ed0e3ab9: Each sub-detector has a version number in order to support different design schemes.
elements.2211.03137_487be0669d5b26de41da9f0f3b02a: The key point of detector data management is a service for detector description in XML format
elements.2211.03137_025c11b1ebb5c50aef6e3631cd2af: ), which is developed as a middleware between DD4hep and OSCAR
elements.2211.03137_b9fc09e6ec87000632bc4da44c096: It manages transformations of detector descriptions for simulation, reconstruction and visualization
elements.2211.03137_c8a793cfd4eb9ac1b04029be4e18f: , the detector geometry defined in XML would be parsed and constructed into corresponding sub-detectors or the full detector
elements.2211.03137_5c7bfa911d974702848aa7ee3b16a: has all the information of detectors
elements.2211.03137_1a68443d0d9e206f5d3602050194c: Information would be delivered to different plugins of DD4hep on demand
elements.2211.03137_5fe1d611f76ecb93aa367f59eb80d: For example, information of detector would be delivered to DDG4
elements.2211.03137_2d5a313d21a5a36f03f7c49849176: to transform the geometry into Geant4 format and then used by the detector simulation
elements.2211.03137_74e3004393b87a543d1c644aa4701: for visualization are also integrated, as illustrated in Figure
elements.2211.03137_822169e43ef4eac1b7add8fe25b4c: With current implementations, OSCAR fully supports simulation, reconstruction and visualization work with one single source geometry definition, which naturally guarantees the consistency of geometry information in different applications.

elements.2211.03137_0d56f452b91aaafb0e153f1a87a0c: In OSCAR, the MC data production chain is developed, including event generator, full detector simulation and event reconstruction
elements.2211.03137_a5c9553a7e06dd55aaf66d8445a12: is used to commission the underlying algorithms and validate the basic software function
elements.2211.03137_5a72ca58c4fdb67fe214f16eb433a: are generated by STCFEvtGen, which is reused from BesEvtGen
elements.2211.03137_2989a26da6ccaaadea19446ecc275: resonance in electron positron collision is simulated by the MC event generator KKMC
elements.2211.03137_3b4d2b8c35bcdf732f1963aafdf19: Objects of final-state particles, including charged tracks
elements.2211.03137_cea84c2eb21001d9ce38b8eae87c6: )and neutral photon showers, are reconstructed with simulated hits through the full reconstruction algorithms.
elements.2211.03137_4e3d1e5f5a605696f6d41dd9eecaa: candidate, it's required to have two charged tracks with zero net charge and at least two good photons
elements.2211.03137_04d93424a159783c0ebabd65c4930: To suppress final state radiation photons, the angle between photon and the original direction of the nearest charged track must be greater than
elements.2211.03137_7852810e59698c5c888a3a6f69089: The combination with the closest mass to
elements.2211.03137_c6b88b25780a2e74ebea41040c4ce: The Crystal-Ball function is used to describe the
elements.2211.03137_30723508f3b233921f2c8675607ad: distribution, and the Breit-Wigner function is used to describe the
elements.2211.03137_b86d95c2f26f69768308d8eed307b: In the MC sample, the input values of
elements.2211.03137_1bb64a6d1784c82214e48afe7f6f6: The reconstructed value and corresponding input value are in good agreement, which indicate the reconstruction of the signal process works well
elements.2211.03137_2d8e1f5465fd4e6b1d01e3003d582: At present, a test run of the simulation software is implemented on a dedicated high performance computing cluster under CENTO 7 system
elements.2211.03137_0a6358efaba128cc24d9abc6ec127: Together with the job submission system, large amount of MC samples are being generated, which can be used in futher studies of the detector performance and physical potential capabilities.
elements.2211.03137_717e094582089d3e88a188ad9eac4: In this paper, we developed the Offline Data Processing Software Framework for STCF
elements.2211.03137_414f316558629063636abdc742ff3: (OSCAR), which is based on SNiPER and adopted new technologies and tools, such as DD4hep and podio
elements.2211.03137_09970c49213a3a3e75c31da6985a8: In OSCAR, a chain for full simulation and reconstruction has been set up, and large MC samples have been generated for detector performance study
elements.2211.03137_18f78434ffc5137693bf4576b14d9: The study shows the performance of detector simulation and reconstruction could fulfill the requirements of STCF
elements.2211.03137_a05f77c4704e848f5e492a5ab038f: Meanwhile, OSCAR is also provide a potential solution for other lightweight HEP experiments.
elements.2211.03137_76821dbbaf8a4cd42e8d04ebba801: This work was supported by National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) under Contracts Nos. 12025502, 12105158; the international partnership program of the Chinese Academy of Sciences under Grant No. 211134KYSB20200057 ; Double First-Class university project foundation of USTC.
elements.2211.03137_1b1136143e9980747522fbea0bb29: is a new-generation facility of electron positron collider operating at center-of-mass energies of
elements.2211.03137_7169eadc1abf5fe22ed49fa0e565c: GeV, the transition region between perturbative and non-perturbative quantum chromodynamics
elements.2211.03137_fa4607bbccc3ae6108ac8d8db9de0: STCF will play a leading role in the tau, charm and hadron physics of high energy physics intensity frontier in the world
elements.2211.03137_c6874679d409bb07d96b7f07f2c0c: The peak luminosity of STCF is designed to be
elements.2211.03137_e9aa799c5d032f95ed028884912eb: Meanwhile, STCF is expected to produce huge amount of scientific data, which poses many challenges to the STCF detector, online data acquisition
elements.2211.03137_cea8ad4b87b2764699a298247636b: (DAQ) as well as offline data processing
elements.2211.03137_863b226d645a1f7549de5478d96d8: STCF is currently under extensive exploration with a technology research and development program covering design and optimization of the STCF accelerator, detector, trigger, DAQ and offline software
elements.2211.03137_e39b4f1f8569e79997219d793dfd7: To facilitate current detector conceptual design, physics potential studies as well as future raw data analysis, an offline software of Super Tau Charm Facility (OSCAR) is designed and developed to provide a common and high performance platform for STCF offline applications, including physics generators, detailed detector simulation, data calibration, event reconstruction as well as physics analysis.
elements.2211.03137_b35c4a53a0076547e4f935cf32978: The architecture of OSCAR is depicted in Figure
elements.2211.03137_46f59ebe1b02dd340c63a12edfe66: It mainly consists of three layers: the bottom layer is for external libraries, the middle layer is for the core software and the top layer is for STCF specific applications
elements.2211.03137_977cadf66aae83854c14e1a402ec9: External libraries used by OSCAR contain the software and toolkits not only frequently used in HEP experiments, like ROOT
elements.2211.03137_ad05e845588d40e1ce3b156d7011f: , but also some of the Common Turnkey Software Stack (Key4hep)
elements.2211.03137_adfdd9cf3205531f576c81f173521: , which are adopted for the detector description and the event data model, respectively
elements.2211.03137_a3dac344238fd1b7662250e66d9c3: The core software mainly consists of an underlying framework, parallel computing supports, event data model and a data management system
elements.2211.03137_a9be9674c447d3db57a707c037098: It provides key and common functionalities for the whole offline data processing
